snippet.title: STAND-ALONE Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
STAND-ALONE is a cyberpunk action game where you download new skills from your enemies after defeating them. A new trailer revealed that this roguelike deckbuilder is coming to Steam in Summer 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #standalone 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
